title: On the cusp of all-out war against Hezbollah, Israel weighs next move
Live updates: Hundreds dead as Israel vows to continue ‘striking hard’
content: Israel urged civilians to evacuate parts of eastern Lebanon linked to Hezbollah. Monday was the deadliest single day of conflict in Lebanon since its 15-year civil war.
summary: Israel urged civilians to evacuate parts of eastern Lebanon linked to Hezbollah. Monday was the deadliest single day of conflict in Lebanon since its 15-year civil war.

title: IDF says it hit 1,500 more Hezbollah targets in Lebanon

title: U.S. Navy oil tanker damaged at sea in Middle East
content: The USNS Big Horn was damaged in the Middle East when it suffered an undisclosed “incident” and began to flood.

title: López Obrador changed Mexico — but not in the ways he promised
content: The president’s support for the working poor was wildly popular. But he left much of his predecessors’ policies in place, and corruption, violence and impunity remain rampant.

title: Arab leaders condemn Israeli escalation in Lebanon

title: Hundreds of Israeli airstrikes pound Lebanon, killing 492

title: Hezbollah enters ‘new phase’ against Israel; Netanyahu vows to do ‘whatever it takes’ in fight
